column4: guys, what could be the problem if you are getting "host name not found" when you try to surf? how would i know the hosts settings?
check that your DNS is set right
i can browse the net when i connect my laptop to the router... but when i use my wireless router i get a host name not found.
if you can't resolve the name (host name not found) then either a) your DNS is wrong/inaccessible or b) you don't have connectivity or c) both
i have connectivity coz i'm using the same connection with this machine and the other machine which i'm fixing
then you can't see your DNS servers or they aren't set.
why is it that when i connect the pc through LAN cable i can browse the net... but when i use the wireless it can not. :(
i would check that dns servers are set when you use wireless (look at /etc/resolv.conf) and the nslookup test.  Also make sure you have a gateway set when in wireless
